extension.description: The Intellivision, a portmanteau of "intelligent television", was released by Mattel Electronics in 1979. In 2009, IGN named the Intellivision the 14th greatest console of all time.
Mattel Electronics lanzó 1979 Intellivision, un acrónimo de "televisión inteligente". En 2009, IGN nombró a Intellivision la decimocuarta mejor consola de todos los tiempos.
